title: RIOT CRASHING THEN PUTTING ME IN 20 MIN WAIT FOR 5 GAMES
body: Hey, this game is crashing on me and then forces me to DL the new patch causing me not to make it back to the game on time. Then after I get back online, riot puts me in 20 min queve  for 5 games for punishment. WTH MAN

replies.body:
We deployed a quick patch last night to address some issues some players were experiencing after the 6.15 patch. This isn't the reason why you're in low priority queue, though, as games during a quick patch like last night aren't recorded or should end in a draw. I looked into this and found that you've recently had a trend of disconnections, which is why you were put into low priority. 

If you're experiencing technical issues that are disconnecting you from game, please give me more details about what happens so I can provide a proper set of steps to resolve it. Let me know if you have any questions.
